page.title: 07Playground Games
page.content: {* playing 40.40 *}About 12 people play. We dip to find out who is going to count and they count up to 50 slowly in 1s with their eyes shut, but first they must say 'no force around me above me or below me 40.40 scatt'. When they have finished counting they come and look for the rest. They must go about 12 feet away from post, which could be a dustbin or a fence. When they have seen someone they must say '40.40 I see-' whoever they see, where they see them and point, they must be touching post when saying anything. If they say they see someone but got it wrong they have to count again. If they do not come more than 12 feet away from post they are laying eggs and must count again. The last person must try to save the rest by saying '40.40 save all'. If you are not last you must say '40.40 save myself'.
